feed.title: WhoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.41.0 - Add highlight optional metrics and settings page
entry.content:
• Add highlight optional metrics on the backend and frontend (thanks to @modelorona)
  • Add settings screen to enable/disable the metrics (thanks to @modelorona)
  • Update libraries
    • [frontend] Gqlgen
    • [frontend] @graphql-codegen
    • [frontend] tailwindcss
    • [frontend] framer motion
    • [core] gqlparser
    • [frontend] @types/lodash
    • [frontend] @types/react
    • [frontend] @types/nodes
    • [frontend] redux tool kit
    • [core] mongodb driver
    • [frontend] testing library jest

What's Changed

  • fix small filter bug + add contact form option by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/184
  • modify how the server starts + stops as to allow for better flexibility in releasing resources by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/185
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 22.5.4 to 22.7.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/183
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.5.4 to 11.9.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/182
  • build(deps): bump @types/react from 18.3.5 to 18.3.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/181
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.16 to 2.5.17 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/180
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 3.4.11 to 3.4.13 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/170
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.51 to 0.17.54 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/167
  • build(deps): bump monaco-editor from 0.51.0 to 0.52.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/164
  • build(deps): bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.16.1 to 1.17.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/162
  • build(deps): bump @types/react from 18.3.10 to 18.3.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/210
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.7 to 4.17.12 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/209
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.17 to 2.5.18 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/207
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.9.0 to 11.11.9 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/206
  • build(deps): bump tailwind-merge from 2.5.2 to 2.5.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/205
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript from 4.0.9 to 4.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/201
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.54 to 0.17.55 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/194
  • add tentative highlight metrics + setting screen by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/187
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/jest-dom from 6.5.0 to 6.6.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/217
  • build(deps): bump framer-motion from 11.11.9 to 11.11.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/216
  • build(deps): bump @types/jest from 29.5.13 to 29.5.14 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/215
  • build(deps): bump @reduxjs/toolkit from 2.2.7 to 2.3.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/214
  • build(deps): bump @types/node from 22.7.4 to 22.8.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/218
  • build(deps): bump go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver from 1.17.0 to 1.17.1 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/190

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.38.0...0.41.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.42.0 - Fix response viewer bug & redesign logic page
entry.content:
• Remove card layout on the login page for a cleaner look
  • Fix raw execute response viewer to keep cache of submitted code and show table on select queries (case insensitive check)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.39.0...0.42.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.43.0 - Fix scan and update issue for MySQL & MariaDB
entry.content:
• [core] add backticks to be part of the conditions (Issue: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/230)
  • [core] Buffio has some issues with scanning due to limits. Change the logic to support larger texts (Issue: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/issues/231)

What's Changed

  • Fix typos by @szepeviktor in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/234
  • build(deps): bump github.com/elastic/go-elasticsearch/v8 from 8.15.0 to 8.16.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/241
  • build(deps): bump @highlight-run/react from 6.0.4 to 7.0.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/240
  • build(deps): bump web-vitals from 4.2.3 to 4.2.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/219
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.55 to 0.17.56 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/237
  • build(deps): bump uuid from 10.0.0 to 11.0.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/236
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript-operations from 4.2.3 to 4.3.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/221
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/cli from 5.0.2 to 5.0.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/220

New Contributors

  • @szepeviktor made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/234

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.42.0...0.43.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.44.0 - Release - Clickhouse support, Postgres smart parser ui tweaks, dependency updates
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

Features: - Clickhouse support 🥳 (yay! let us know if you run into any bugs) - Add smart parsing Postgres URL (a big thanks to @HarshDodiya1)

Security Fixes [Availability] - Fix memory unbound consumption bug (a big thanks to @thevilledev)

Maintenance: - Small UI tweaks 🎨 - Dependency updates :dependabot: - Move to Parcel for better build performance (fix up the file server to work with the new bundle) - Make the notification styling matching Clidey platform's.

What's Changed

  • add ClickHouse support by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/211
  • update clickhouse raw execute query to use params by @modelorona in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/264
  • build(deps): bump cross-spawn from 7.0.3 to 7.0.6 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/263
  • build(deps): bump rollup from 2.79.1 to 2.79.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/262
  • build(deps): bump dset from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/261
  • build(deps): bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/260
  • build(deps): bump gorm.io/driver/postgres from 1.5.9 to 1.5.11 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/254
  • build(deps): bump github.com/vektah/gqlparser/v2 from 2.5.19 to 2.5.20 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/250
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.56 to 0.17.57 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/249
  • build(deps): bump @types/react-dom from 18.3.0 to 18.3.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/246
  • build(deps-dev): bump @types/lodash from 4.17.12 to 4.17.13 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/244
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/jest-dom from 6.6.2 to 6.6.3 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/242
  • build(deps): bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/267
  • build(deps): bump micromatch from 4.0.7 to 4.0.8 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/266
  • build(deps): bump express from 4.19.2 to 4.21.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/259
  • build(deps): bump webpack from 5.92.0 to 5.97.1 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/265
  • build(deps): bump @apollo/client from 3.11.8 to 3.12.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/257
  • build(deps): bump react-router-dom from 6.27.0 to 7.0.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/253
  • build(deps-dev): bump tailwindcss from 3.4.14 to 3.4.16 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/270
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.28.0 to 0.31.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/283
  • build(deps): bump github.com/go-chi/chi/v5 from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/282
  • build(deps): bump github.com/99designs/gqlgen from 0.17.57 to 0.17.60 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/277
  • build(deps): bump gorm.io/driver/sqlite from 1.5.6 to 1.5.7 in /core by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/276
  • build(deps): bump @testing-library/react from 16.0.1 to 16.1.0 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/274
  • build(deps): bump nanoid from 3.3.7 to 3.3.8 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/279
  • build(deps): bump @highlight-run/react from 7.0.3 to 8.0.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/273
  • build(deps-dev): bump @graphql-codegen/typescript from 4.1.1 to 4.1.2 in /frontend by @dependabot in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/272
  • Update README.md using remote ollama server by @learningpro in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/251
  • feat(auth): fix dos attack bug by @hkdeman in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/293
  • [FR] Added feature to automatically parse postgres url when pasting by @HarshDodiya1 in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/255

New Contributors

  • @learningpro made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/251
  • @HarshDodiya1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/255

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.43.0...0.44.0

entry.title: New release for WhoDB: 0.45.0 - Release - Fix login with profile flow and couple improvements
entry.content:
Generated By Clidey's Auto GitHub Release

✨ Improvements

Predictable Storage Unit Sorting: - Thanks to the contribution by @FunnyPocketBook, storage units are now sorted to provide greater predictability and a more consistent user experience.

Enhanced Logging for Pre-Built Login Profiles:
- Improved logging has been added to provide clearer and more actionable error messages when parsing pre-built login profiles from environment variables fails.

🐛 Bug Fixes

LoginWithProfile Fix:
- Resolved an issue with LoginWithProfile where it failed to work properly with pre-built login profiles provided through environment variables. It should now function as intended.

Thank you to everyone who contributed to this release! 🚀
Your feedback and support are invaluable.

What's Changed

  • Sort tables in storage-unit alphabetically by @FunnyPocketBook in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/310

New Contributors

  • @FunnyPocketBook made their first contribution in https://github.com/clidey/whodb/pull/310

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clidey/whodb/compare/0.44.0...0.45.0
